author: lacton
msg: Stabilized a test that was failing randomly. The test was not setting the right timestamp.

author: cmchen
msg: * Started shift towards moving field-level parsing into BinaryInputStream and BinaryOutputStream.
* Fixed a png unit test that used a piece of Java 1.6 syntax.
* Added unit tests around the new IPTC functionality.

author: hboutemy
msg: test-deploy unit-test doesn't depend on current pom.xml any more: now works even with a non-SNAPSHOT version of maven-ant-tasks (merged from 2.0.x branch r688556)
